footer.description: Allow customers to search for shops or companions conveniently and quickly to access services more easily and increase the number of customers for you in your career field. Gain business advantages and choose to serve according to your own satisfaction. The system is easy to use, safe and risk-free.

slogans.5: Where souls meet and hearts unite.

home.heroSubtitle: Join millions of people finding meaningful connections and lasting relationships.

benefits.title: Earn Rewards by Referring Friends
benefits.subtitle: Invite your friends to join XaoSao (as companions) and you will receive rewards such as:

tier1.label: Per Referral
tier1.description: Receive 50,000 KIP instantly for referring friends through your referral link to become companions. From today until 30/4/2026 only!

tier2.label: If you refer 20 friends
tier2.description: Refer 20 friends to become companions successfully, and receive a special bonus of 1,000,000 KIP extra!

tier3.label: Grand Prize
tier3.description: Companions who accumulate earnings from their own services totaling 50,000,000 KIP will receive a Luang Prabang travel package for 2 days 3 nights!

benefits.ctaHint: Opportunity and income are in your own referrals.

hotModels.title: Hot Companions
hotModels.subtitle: Discover our most popular companions
hotModels.loginPrompt: Login to view full profile and connect

videoTutorials.title: Video Tutorials
videoTutorials.subtitle: Learn how to use XaoSao with our step-by-step video guides. Choose your role below to get started.
videoTutorials.customerDescription: Learn how to discover companions, make bookings, and use all customer features.
videoTutorials.companionDescription: Complete guides for companions to set up profiles, manage bookings, and maximize earnings.
videoTutorials.customerCta: Create your account now and start discovering amazing companions!
videoTutorials.companionCta: Join our platform as a companion and start earning today!

register.title: How to Create Your Account
register.description: This comprehensive tutorial walks you through the entire registration process on XaoSao. Learn how to download the app, create your account with your phone number, verify your identity with OTP, set up your profile with photos and personal information, and configure your preferences to start discovering amazing companions in your area.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password? No Problem!
forgotPassword.description: Lost access to your account? Don't worry! This step-by-step guide shows you exactly how to recover your account using our secure OTP verification system. Learn how to request a password reset, receive and enter your verification code, create a new secure password, and regain access to your account in just a few minutes.

booking.title: How to Book a Companion
booking.description: Master the complete booking process from start to finish. This tutorial covers how to browse companion profiles, check availability and services, select your preferred date and time, choose the services you want, make secure payments, and confirm your appointment. We also explain the booking status system and what to expect after booking.

overview.title: App Overview & Features
overview.description: Get a complete tour of everything XaoSao has to offer! This overview video covers all the main features including the discover page, matching system, real-time chat, booking management, payment options, profile customization, notification settings, and safety features. Perfect for new users who want to make the most of the platform.

register.title: How to Register as a Companion
register.description: Start your journey as a XaoSao companion with this detailed registration guide. Learn how to create your professional profile, upload attractive photos, write an engaging bio, set your availability schedule, choose your service areas, and complete the verification process. We cover everything you need to know to get approved and start receiving bookings.

referral.title: Referral Program - Earn More
referral.description: Discover how to boost your income with our lucrative referral program! This tutorial explains how the referral system works, how to generate and share your unique referral code, track your referrals in real-time, and earn rewards for every friend who joins and completes their first booking. Learn strategies to maximize your referral earnings.

serviceBank.title: Setting Up Services & Bank Account
serviceBank.description: This essential tutorial guides you through configuring your companion profile for success. Learn how to add and price your services, upload gallery images that attract customers, set up your bank account for secure withdrawals, manage your payment preferences, and ensure your profile stands out. A must-watch before you start accepting bookings.

booking.title: Managing Bookings
booking.description: Become a pro at handling customer bookings with this comprehensive guide. Learn how to view and respond to booking requests, accept or decline appointments, communicate with customers, prepare for your dates, complete bookings successfully, handle special situations, and maintain high ratings. Includes tips for providing excellent service and building repeat customers.

twofa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twofa.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twofa.description: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.

twofa.description2: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.description3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
twofa.description4: Keep your backup codes in a safe place
twofa.step1: Download an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
twofa.step2: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
twofa.step4: Keep your backup codes in a safe place
twofa.instruction1: After you enable Two-Factor Authentication, you will be required to enter a verification code each time you log in.
twofa.instruction2: The code will be sent to your registered phone number. Please make sure you are using the correct phone number.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
validation.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.firstNameLettersOnly: First name can only contain letters and spaces (English or Lao).
validation.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.lastNameLettersOnly: Last name can only contain letters and spaces (English or Lao).
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 30 characters long.

validation.dobFormat: Date of birth must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
validation.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old and under 100 years old.
validation.genderRequired: Gender must be one of: male, female, or other.
validation.bioMinLength: Bio must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.bioMaxLength: Bio must be at most 500 characters long.
validation.addressMinLength: Address must be at least 5 characters long.
validation.addressMaxLength: Address must be at most 200 characters long.
validation.careerMaxLength: Career must be at most 100 characters long.
validation.invalidCareerInput: Invalid input detected in career field.
validation.educationMaxLength: Education must be at most 100 characters long.
validation.invalidEducationInput: Invalid input detected in education field.
validation.interestMaxLength: Each interest must be at most 50 characters long.
validation.maxInterests: You can add up to 10 interests only.
validation.resetTokenLength: Reset token must be exactly 6 characters.
validation.invalidTokenFormat: Invalid token format. Must be 6 uppercase hexadecimal characters.
validation.hoursMinimum: Hours must be at least 1 hour.

errors.locationRequired: Unable to get your location. Please enable GPS and try again.
errors.locationError: An error occurred while getting your location.

complete.title: Complete Booking
complete.subtitle: Mark this booking as completed after finishing the service.
complete.confirmDescription: By marking this booking as completed, you confirm that the service has been successfully delivered to the customer.
complete.qrDescription: A QR code will be generated for the customer to scan and confirm the service completion.
complete.paymentDescription: Payment will be released to your wallet after customer scans QR or after 24 hours (auto-release).
complete.success: QR code generated! Let the customer scan to complete.

completeQR.title: Scan to Complete
completeQR.subtitle: Show this QR code to your customer to confirm service completion
completeQR.autoReleaseNote: If customer doesn't scan, payment will be auto-released after 24 hours
completeQR.instructionDescription: Ask your customer to scan this QR code with their phone camera or the app. Once they confirm, payment will be released to your wallet.

delete.title: Delete Booking
delete.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this booking?
delete.warningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone
delete.warningDescription: Deleting this booking will permanently remove it from your records. This action is only available for rejected bookings.

customerConfirmQR.title: Confirm Service Completion
customerConfirmQR.subtitle: Please confirm that the service has been completed satisfactorily
customerConfirmQR.alreadyCompletedDescription: This booking has already been confirmed and completed.
customerConfirmQR.expiredDescription: This QR code has expired. The payment will be automatically released to the model within 24 hours.
customerConfirmQR.paymentDescription: By confirming, you agree that the service was delivered as expected. The payment will be released to the model immediately.
customerConfirmQR.success: Service confirmed! Payment has been released.

errors.invalidQR: This QR code is invalid or has already been used

modelNotifications.title: Notifications
modelNotifications.subtitle: Stay updated with your bookings
modelNotifications.noNotificationsDescription: You'll see booking updates and messages here

pwa.description: Install XaoSao on your device for a better experience with faster access and offline support.
pwa.iosStep1: Tap the Share button in Safari
pwa.quickInstall: Quick install - no app store needed

callService.title: Call Service
callService.description: Voice or video call with per-minute billing
callService.insufficientBalance: You need at least 1 minute worth of balance to make a call.
callService.callMissed: The model did not answer. Your balance has been refunded.
callService.modelBusy: The model is currently unavailable. Your balance has been refunded.
callService.balanceLow: Low balance! Call will end soon.
callService.earningsAdded: Earnings have been added to your wallet.
